description: Number of 3rd order maximal independent sets in cycle graph.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. Yanco and A. Bagchi, ``K-th order maximal independent sets in path and cycle graphs,'' J. Graph Theory, submitted, 1994.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: For n>=9: a(n)=a(n-2) + a(n-5) per A133394. - G. Reed Jameson (Reedjameson(AT)yahoo.com), Dec 13 2007, Dec 16 2007G.f.: x^2*(-2*x^3-2-3*x+3*x^6)/(-1+x^2+x^5). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 30 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
extensions: More terms from Harvey P. Dale, Oct 23 2011
